Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Wentowrth, 115th, Halsted and 119th: due to, street blockage near 119th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Wentowrth, 115th, Halsted and 119th: due to, street blockage near 119th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity at Kostner. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity at Kostner.

Shuttles busses are available from Forest Park to Western to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
